availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James L. Kendall (Morgan County, Kentucky, hotel keeper)

body.p: Morgan County, Kentucky, hotel keeper. Son of William H. Kendall and Susan Kendall. Married to Elizabeth Kendall. Father of William Kendall and Susan Kendall. Merchant in Morgan County in 1850. Hotel keeper in Morgan County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan, District 1, p. 137B. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan, District 1, p. 110.
